# IDA Pro with Yara Scan

This is Yara Scan for IDA Pro

First you need download IDAScope from [IDAScope v11](http://pnx-tf.blogspot.com/2014/02/idascope-v11-yara-scanning.html). Please ensure you have install yara-python, you may find it on [Yara-Python](https://github.com/plusvic/yara/releases/tag/2.1.0)
For Windows user please copy \python27\lib\site-packages\yara.pyd into your \IDA\lib
For Linux please refer to [http://secshoggoth.blogspot.com/2014/02/installing-yara-into-ida-pro-64-bit.html](http://secshoggoth.blogspot.com/2014/02/installing-yara-into-ida-pro-64-bit.html)
